items.title: Upload Image
items.description: Choose a photo from your device or enter a URL. Supported formats include JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.description: Use our text tool to add your witty captions or jokes to the image.

items.title: Download Meme

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about our Meme Generator

items.title: What types of images work best for memes?
items.description: Any image can be turned into a meme, but images with expressions, relatable situations, or funny scenarios work particularly well.

items.title: Is there a limit to how many memes I can create?
items.description: No limits! Create and share as many memes as you want. Enjoy unlimited creativity.

items.title: Can I use my memes for commercial purposes?
items.description: Yes! Feel free to use your memes for personal or commercial projects. Share your creativity without restrictions.

items.title: How does the privacy aspect work?
items.description: All meme creation occurs in your browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring absolute privacy.

footer.heading: Ready to Create Viral Memes?
